verses.verse: Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H662>control<s%> himself before <S%H3605>all<s%> those who <S%H5324>stood<s%> by him, and he <S%H7121>cried,<s%> "Have <S%H3605>everyone<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> out from me." So there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> with him when <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3045>made<s%> himself <S%H3045>known<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

And he <S%H5414>wept<s%> <S%H6963><s%> <S%H1065><s%> so <S%H6963>loudly<s%> that the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> [it], and the <S%H1004>household<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> [of it].

Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> "I am <S%H3130>Joseph!<s%> Is my father <S%H1>still<s%> <S%H5750>alive<s%>?" But his <S%H2416>brothers<s%> <S%H251>could<s%> not <S%H3201>answer<s%> him, for they were <S%H6030>dismayed<s%> at his <S%H926>presence.<s%>

Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>closer<s%> to me." And they <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>closer.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H4376>sold<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

"And <S%H6258>now<s%> do not be <S%H6087>grieved<s%> or <S%H2734>angry<s%> with <S%H5869>yourselves,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you <S%H4376>sold<s%> me <S%H2008>here;<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> me <S%H6440>before<s%> you to <S%H4241>preserve<s%> <S%H4241>life.<s%>

"For the <S%H7458>famine<s%> [has been] in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> two <S%H8141>years,<s%> and there are <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> will be <S%H369>neither<s%> <S%H2758>plowing<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> <S%H7105>harvesting.<s%>

"And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> me <S%H6440>before<s%> you to <S%H7760>preserve<s%> for you a <S%H7611>remnant<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and to <S%H2421>keep<s%> you <S%H2421>alive<s%> by a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6413>deliverance.<s%>

<S%H6258>"Now,<s%> therefore, it was not you who <S%H7971>sent<s%> me <S%H2008>here,<s%> but <S%H430>God;<s%> and He has <S%H7760>made<s%> me a father to <S%H1>Pharaoh<s%> and <S%H6547>lord<s%> of <S%H113>all<s%> his <S%H3605>household<s%> and <S%H1004>ruler<s%> over <S%H4910>all<s%> the <S%H3605>land<s%> of <S%H776>Egypt.<s%>

<S%H4116>"Hurry<s%> and <S%H5927>go<s%> up to my father, and <S%H1>say<s%> to him, <S%H559>'Thus<s%> <S%H3541>says<s%> your <S%H559>son<s%> <S%H1121>Joseph,<s%> <S%H3130>"God<s%> has <S%H430>made<s%> me <S%H7760>lord<s%> of <S%H113>all<s%> <S%H3605>Egypt;<s%> <S%H4714>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to me, do not <S%H3381>delay.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen,<s%> and you shall be <S%H7138>near<s%> me, you and your <S%H1121>children<s%> and your <S%H1121>children<s%>'s children and your <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and your <S%H1241>herds<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that you have.

<S%H8033>"There<s%> I will also <S%H3557>provide<s%> for you, for there are <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%> [to come], <S%H6435>lest<s%> you and your <S%H1004>household<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that you have be <S%H3423>impoverished.<s%>"'

"And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>see,<s%> and the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of my <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> [see], that it is my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> which is <S%H1696>speaking<s%> to you.

"Now you must <S%H5046>tell<s%> my father of <S%H1>all<s%> my <S%H3605>splendor<s%> in <S%H9202>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H4714>all<s%> that you have <S%H3605>seen;<s%> and you must <S%H7200>hurry<s%> and <S%H4116>bring<s%> my father <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H1>here.<s%>"
Then he <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>'s <S%H6677>neck<s%> and <S%H1058>wept;<s%> and Benjamin <S%H1058>wept<s%> on his <S%H6677>neck.<s%>
And he <S%H5401>kissed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H251>brothers<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> on them, and <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> his <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H1696>talked<s%> with him.

Now when the <S%H6963>news<s%> was <S%H8085>heard<s%> in <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> that Joseph's <S%H251>brothers<s%> had <S%H935>come,<s%> it <S%H3190>pleased<s%> <S%H5869><s%> Pharaoh and his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H559>"Say<s%> to your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H6213>'Do<s%> <S%H2088>this:<s%> <S%H2943>load<s%> your <S%H1165>beasts<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H935><s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%>

and <S%H3947>take<s%> your father and your <S%H1>households<s%> and <S%H1004>come<s%> to me, and I will <S%H935>give<s%> you the <S%H5414>best<s%> of the <S%H2898>land<s%> of <S%H776>Egypt<s%> and you shall <S%H4714>eat<s%> the <S%H398>fat<s%> of the <S%H2459>land.<s%>'

"Now you are <S%H6680>ordered,<s%> <S%H6213>'Do<s%> <S%H2088>this:<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H5699>wagons<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for your <S%H2945>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones<s%> and for your <S%H802>wives,<s%> and <S%H5375>bring<s%> your father and <S%H1>come.<s%>

'And do not <S%H2347>concern<s%> <S%H5869><s%> <S%H5869>yourselves<s%> with your <S%H3627>goods,<s%> for the <S%H2898>best<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> is yours.' "

Then the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so;<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H5699>wagons<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>command<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H6720>provisions<s%> for the <S%H1870>journey.<s%>

To <S%H3605>each<s%> <S%H376><s%> of them he <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H2487>changes<s%> of <S%H8071>garments,<s%> but to <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> [pieces of] <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H2487>changes<s%> of <S%H8071>garments.<s%>

And to his father he <S%H1>sent<s%> as <S%H7971>follows:<s%> <S%H2088>ten<s%> <S%H6235>donkeys<s%> <S%H2543>loaded<s%> with the <S%H5375>best<s%> <S%H2898>things<s%> of <S%H2898>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H4714>ten<s%> <S%H6235>female<s%> <S%H860>donkeys<s%> <S%H860>loaded<s%> with <S%H5375>grain<s%> and <S%H1250>bread<s%> and <S%H3899>sustenance<s%> for his father on the <S%H4202>journey.<s%>
So he <S%H7971>sent<s%> his <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H7971>away,<s%> and as they <S%H1980>departed,<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "Do not <S%H7264>quarrel<s%> on the <S%H1870>journey.<s%>"
Then they <S%H5927>went<s%> up from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> to their father <S%H1>Jacob.<s%>

And they <S%H5046>told<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3130>"Joseph<s%> is <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H2416>alive,<s%> and <S%H3588>indeed<s%> he is <S%H4910>ruler<s%> over <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>" But he was <S%H6313>stunned,<s%> for he did not <S%H539>believe<s%> them.

When they <S%H1696>told<s%> him <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> that he had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to them, and when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5699>wagons<s%> that <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> him, the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of their father <S%H1>Jacob<s%> <S%H3290>revived.<s%>

Then <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is <S%H7227>enough;<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> is <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H2416>alive.<s%> I will <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> him <S%H2962>before<s%> I <S%H4191>die.<s%>"
